Class PersonIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.vighnorbert.PersonIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PersonIndex
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class holding the index of all the parsed people from the Wikipedia dump.
    See Also:

      • isPerson

        public Person isPerson(java.lang.String name)
        Function to check if a person is in the index and therefore is a person, since all people are in the index after parsing.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the person to check
        Returns:
        the person if found, null otherwise
